g.text: These are: Facilitator, Validator, Miner and Executor.
Send job details and the public key
provide Job IP address, port and
Send a request to validate Miner's result.
Reply. Before the transmission ends, sign input/output
digest (or full value(s) in case of texts)
[Validate every nth ComputeHorde's answer on trusted hardware]
Send the same request as the one to ComputeHorde
Inform all validators about malicious ComputeHorde miner.
The signature (using the job key) in the result
ascertains validators of the miner's result.
All validators, after verifying the correct
answers on their own trusted hardware,
give 0 weights to the malicious miner.
